title: Priority in courts
context: [ยง342B-54] Priority in courts. All actions brought pursuant to this chapter or pursuant to the rules adopted under this chapter or pursuant to the conditions of a permit issued under this chapter shall in the discretion of the court receive priority in the courts of the State. [L 1992, c 240, pt of ยง1] Note The amendment made by L 2014, c 218, ยง8 is not included in this section.
